text: everything's here if you know how to find it.

linkTitle: styled version of the simple system
text: Does everything the simple system does, but adds fellows' custom css. If you're an LL Fellow, just add your css file to public folder of the Github repo and you should be good to go. If you're not a fellow, you can still click here to see the resources with different styles applied.
